prompts: Create a bug-type Pokemon with vibrant green tones and a leaf-inspired design.
I want a Pokemon that resembles an insect, featuring bright colors and a humanoid shape.
Generate a nature-themed Pokemon with unique features that highlight its connection to plants.
Make an elegant bug Pokemon with long limbs and a striking color palette.
Imagine a Pokemon that can camouflage in grass, sporting shades of green and yellow.
Design a Pokemon that combines insect elements with a playful personality.
Show me a Pokemon that thrives in forest environments and has a distinct leaf motif.
